short_summary: Supply of a variety of ESDC and Service Canada custom size envelopes and shipping services for their distribution
description: ESDC requires services for the supply of a variety of ESDC and Service Canada custom size envelopes, as well as shipping services to have the printed products distributed to ESDC offices and other locations across Canada.
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: Printing Services for ESDC and Service Canada Envelopes

#### Reference Information
* Reference Number: CB-589-49748896
* Solicitation Number: 100024781
* Amendment Number: 7
* Publication Date: October 26, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: November 21, 2023 at 14:00

#### Project Description
Employment Social Development Canada (ESDC) is seeking a contractor to provide printing services for a variety of ESDC and Service Canada custom size envelopes. The contractor will also be responsible for distributing the printed products to ESDC offices and other locations across Canada.

#### Contract Overview
The contract period will be from the contract award date to March 31, 2025, inclusive. The contractor must print and deliver all items in full quantities as outlined in the Statement of Work. Quality control of the various print products requested is the responsibility of the contractor.

#### Mandatory Requirements
* The contractor must respect the delivery date specified in the Request for Proposal and ensure they are able to meet this requirement before submitting their bid.
* Deliverables must be received as specified at Annex “C.”
* The contractor must comply with the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Evaluation Criteria
The responsive bid with the highest combined rating of technical merit and price will be recommended for award of a contract.

#### Language
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

#### Contact Information
Patrick Blais
Digital Business Area General Inquiry
(000) 000-0000
nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca

#### Attachment
The following attachments can be downloaded from the Canada Buys website:

* Tender notice
* Amendment 1
* Amendment 2
* Amendment 3
* Request for Proposal
* Annex B and C

Note: The attached files can be downloaded from the provided URL.

#### Trade Agreement
This tender is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

Word Count: 392 words. 

Rewritten Entry Summary:
The rewritten entry has provided a clear and summarized version of the original tender announcement from Employment Social Development Canada (ESDC). The rewritten announcement includes necessary information such as the reference number, solicitation number, amendment number, publication date, and tender closing date are now clear and concise, making it easier to read and understand. The project description now explains the requirements of the printing services in more detail, including the distribution
